report.title: EU Pollinator Transects Occurrences Download
report.description: Occurrrences download for EU Pollinator transects. Contains onlt occurrence rows with a selection of section and parent transect columns.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM samples s_parent JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional s_parent_nonfunct on s_parent_nonfunct.id = s_parent.id JOIN cache_samples_functional s_parent_funct on s_parent_funct.id = s_parent_nonfunct.id LEFT JOIN samples s_section on s_section.parent_id = s_parent.id AND s_section.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional s_section_nonfunct on s_section_nonfunct.id = s_section.id JOIN locations transect on transect.id = s_parent.location_id AND transect.deleted = false AND transect.location_type_id = #transect_location_type_id# JOIN locations mvs_sites on mvs_sites.id = transect.parent_id AND mvs_sites.deleted = false AND mvs_sites.location_type_id = #mvs_square_location_type_id# JOIN location_attribute_values country_code_attr_val on country_code_attr_val.location_id = mvs_sites.id AND country_code_attr_val.location_attribute_id = #country_code_loc_attr_id# AND country_code_attr_val.deleted = false JOIN locations country on country.code = country_code_attr_val.text_value AND country.deleted = false AND country.location_type_id = #country_location_type_id# JOIN cache_occurrences_functional cof on cof.sample_id = s_section.id JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional cnf on cnf.id = cof.id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id = cof.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id WHERE #sharing_filter# AND s_parent.parent_id IS NULL AND s_parent.survey_id = #survey_id# AND ((trim('#year_sort_order#') = '0' OR '#year_sort_order#'='<please select>' OR s_parent.date_end >= CAST((0-(#year_sort_order#)::int)::text || '-01-01' as date)) AND (trim('#year_sort_order#') = '0' OR '#year_sort_order#'='<please select>' OR s_parent.date_start <= CAST((0-(#year_sort_order#)::int)::text || '-12-31' as date)))

param.name: current_user_id
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Survey ID to limit results to.

param.name: start_time_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the start time.

param.name: end_time_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the end time.

param.name: wind_direction_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the wind direction.

param.name: wind_speed_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the wind speed.

param.name: temperature_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the temperature.

param.name: sun_percentage_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds sun percentage.

param.name: cloud_percentage_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds cloud percentage.

param.name: year_sort_order
param.description: Select a year, or leave blank for all years

param.name: country_code_loc_attr_id
param.description: ID of the location attribute that holds the country code for an MVS location.

param.name: transect_location_type_id
param.description: ID of the location type for transects.

param.name: mvs_square_location_type_id
param.description: ID of the location type for MVS Squares.

param.name: country_location_type_id
param.description: ID of the location type for countries.
